'''''Proof of the Reed Sea Conqueror''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Meetings in Outrealm: Series IV]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Guardian of Apep's Oasis]] in [[Co-Op Mode]].
